text:
I’ve found most D&D players take coronavirus seriously. We know two things from experience:

(A) a 2% risk is *not* as low as it sounds.  

(B)  no matter how high your Constitution score, you can *always* fail your saving throw.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.name: Multimedia Franchise
domain.description: Franchises which span multiple forms of media like 'Harry Potter'

entity.name: Dungeons & Dragons
entity.description: This entity includes all conversation about the franchise, as well as any individual installments in the series, if applicable.
